# HUD::SET_MOUSE_CURSOR_STYLE

## Summary
Sets the style of the mouse pointer

## Parameters
* **eMOUSE_POINTER_STYLE** style: Type (see eMOUSE_POINTER_STYLE)

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Changes the mouse cursor's sprite. 
1 = Normal
6 = Left Arrow
7 = Right Arrow
